scripts.build:optimize: vite build && npm run optimize:assets && npm run analyze:bundle
scripts.deploy: npm run build:production && git add dist/ && git commit -m "Deploy: atualização do build" && git push origin main
scripts.test:routes: node -e "const routes = ['informatica', 'programacao', 'design-grafico', 'projetista-3d', 'edicao-video', 'marketing-digital', 'inteligencia-artificial', 'business-intelligence']; console.log('✅ Testando rotas dos cursos:'); routes.forEach(slug => console.log(`  ✓ /cursos/${slug}`)); console.log(`\n📊 Total: ${routes.length} rotas configuradas`);"
scripts.optimize:assets: echo '🎯 Otimizando assets...' && npm run optimize:images
scripts.optimize:images: echo '🖼️ Imagens já otimizadas via Vite'
scripts.analyze:bundle: echo '📊 Análise de bundle disponível em: https://bundlephobia.com'
scripts.perf:test: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && npm run perf:audit
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
